feed.title: UpSnap Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.1
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 80fb1a612720c2918f7d52fcc902bbc13f9ffa2a: fix: ping test case (@seriousm4x)
  • 92a66fc8a477ba3f1c5cf98c6d41673fa4fd8328: fix: reduce port check errors (@seriousm4x)
  • 95946d7cc2ad25e0ca1eac9d89cef187c530f1a3: fix: sveltekit-sync and update (@seriousm4x)
  • fee9d605f14767d959475d2c2ad38e89d70dac04: fix: update interval format in docker compose (@seriousm4x)
  • c125afdfc7f7831a3b9c5b686772950767e26c12: fix: use netErr.Timeout() to check for timeout (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 8c52952a1e497f36c5273c625beeeba1663b9d9c: Update docker-compose version (@seriousm4x)
  • 8bedcbf88aa74177856e463174b787265c13c5f9: cleaner if (@seriousm4x)
  • ac16e982ea8e8b692509b0eac69e507a6a72f301: update docker compose to v5 (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.2
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • c9bc0c8f38fd4a5c06a6974d88b32d06af708819: fix: port check ignore connection refused error (@seriousm4x)
  • 69acc57ed27081b5b09da917e6ab5c02b6d692ac: fix: save failed when creating new device (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.4
entry.content:
Changelog

Go dependencies

  • e13e9dfce0489a455ae2d195bf822eb350d2149c: go-dep: bump (@seriousm4x)
  • 12b3b782cd887df02381f4906c4d741bf53b7168: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 98f222bfb9843b2c7632e4521b98d763b88335d4: go-dep: update (@seriousm4x)

Npm dependencies

  • 2b7d68b8665b8e900be09616fd15b86583850c05: npm-dep: bump, close #1045 (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.5
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 20e274d4323ed36b8e2ac3eac3e46f7bbef5921b: feat: handlers return status of device action (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 24ed3c3f8fe0d05e40b7aedefb82230ae04c660c: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)
  • fec897944f3830fae325d8f09547511053af5c2f: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)
  • c4d93cdfadc77047678f059e7cbcd85f538e9831: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)

  • de37325b281af6b032e0d72968f7fd92182cf138: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)
  • bf51b389c2305dfa2e2da77f2af33641f5d5acf1: rename translations to match locale names (@seriousm4x)
  • d40d2d1ee5b69cfe6c1b082f85b00c09ba988a8b: update all deps (@seriousm4x)
